title: Are sunrises and sunsets more spectacular in winter?
description: Shorter days, crisp clean air and a low winter sun all play a role in those vivid pink and golden skies.
content: Shorter days, crisp clean air and a low winter sun all play a role in those vivid pink and golden skies.
